## AbstractDevice.createTexture2DFromMipmapData() method

Creates a 2d texture from given mipmap data

**Signature:**

```typescript
createTexture2DFromMipmapData(data: TextureMipmapData, sRGB: boolean, options?: TextureCreationOptions): Texture2D;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | [TextureMipmapData](doc/markdown/./device.texturemipmapdata.md) | The mipmap data |
|  sRGB | boolean |  |
|  options | [TextureCreationOptions](doc/markdown/./device.texturecreationoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ The creation options |

**Returns:**
